thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Mutual Funds Win as SEC Proposes to Keep Lid on Liquidity Disclosures

author: Dave Michaels
title: Mutual Funds Win as SEC Proposes to Keep Lid on Liquidity Disclosures
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”Mutual funds would be spared from having to tell shareholders how they score the liquidity of their holdings, under a proposal the Securities and Exchange Commission approved Wednesday.
The proposal represents a significant concession to the $19 trillion U.S. mutual-fund industry, which argued the data would confuse shareholders and could prompt them to spurn funds that report higher percentages of less liquid assets such as high-yield bonds. The five-member SEC voted 3-2 to approve the plan, with Democratic commissioners...
